title: Define project scope and requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the TeamSynergyDashboard, including features, data sources, user roles, and performance expectations.

title: Design system architecture
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points with existing systems. Consider the following aspects:

1. Modular design: Divide the system into logical components or modules to promote maintainability, scalability, and reusability.
2. Data storage: Determine the appropriate database system (relational, NoSQL, or a combination) based on the data structure and query requirements.
3. Backend services: Define the necessary backend services for data processing, business logic, and API endpoints.
4. Frontend components: Plan the frontend architecture, including UI components, state management, and communication with backend services.
5. Authentication and authorization: Implement secure authentication and authorization mechanisms for user access and data protection.
6. Integration points: Identify existing systems or services that need to be integrated, such as communication tools, project management tools, or productivity tracking tools.
7. Scalability and performance: Consider strategies for horizontal scaling, load balancing, and caching to ensure system performance under high load.
8. Monitoring and logging: Incorporate monitoring and logging mechanisms for system health, performance, and debugging.
9. Deployment and infrastructure: Outline the deployment strategy (e.g., containerization, cloud, on-premises) and infrastructure requirements.

title: Design database schema
description: Design the database schema to store team productivity, communication, and project data, considering data normalization, indexing, and scalability.

title: Design frontend UI/UX
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the collaborative dashboard, considering best practices for usability, accessibility, and responsiveness across different devices and screen sizes. The design should align with the project's branding guidelines and incorporate feedback from user research and testing.
dependencies: Define user personas and use cases

title: Implement backend services
description: Develop backend services to handle data processing, analysis, and integration with existing systems.

title: Implement frontend components
description: Develop frontend components to visualize team productivity, communication patterns, and project progress.

title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

title: Implement security measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure data privacy and system integrity, including access controls, encryption, auditing, and secure communication protocols. Adhere to industry best practices and security standards (e.g., OWASP, NIST).

title: Write documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the TeamSynergyDashboard, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.

title: Conduct testing and quality assurance
description: Perform thorough testing and quality assurance activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.
